name: Prove Yourself Hoodie
description: Proof of going places. Now with bragging rights, made to fit in a web3 wallet. A POAP is a digital collectible created as a NFT (non-fungible token) powered by the blockchain. Each time they take part on an event, POAP collectors get a unique badge that is supported by a cryptographic record. This fashion isnâ€™t just ordinary fashion. It onboards you into an entire world of NFTs, Decentralized Finance, Crypto and Web3. Every fashion piece is a unique NFT that can also earn you yield in $MONA token and other crypto. We are melting the centralized exploitative crown to weave the fabric of a generative ecosystem.

attributes.value: Fashion x DeFi, Wear to DeFi
